      • get

        @NotNull
 @Contract(pure=true)
public static @NotNull java.lang.Object get(@NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull java.lang.Object object,
                                                                             @NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys)
        Assuming the given object is a JSONArray or a JSONObject, get the value stored at the given nesting keys. If the given object is not a JSONArray nor a JSONObject or a node in the middle is not of these types, an empty string will be returned.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to get from.
        keys - the nesting keys to get the value from.
        Returns:
        the value nested with the given keys in the given object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given object or keys is null.
        Since:
        0.2.0 ~2021.06.01

      • get

        @NotNull
 @Contract(pure=true)
public static @NotNull java.lang.Object get(@NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull java.lang.Object object,
                                                                             @NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull java.lang.String keys)
        Delegates to get(Object, List) with the keys being the result of invoking keys(String) with the given keys.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to get from.
        keys - the source of the keys.
        Returns:
        the value nested with the given keys in the given object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given object or keys is null.
        Since:
        0.2.0 ~2021.06.01

 @Contract(pure=true)
public static @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys(@NotNull
                                                                                              @NotNull java.lang.String keys)
        Convert the given string into a nesting keys list.
        Parameters:
        keys - the source.
        Returns:

      • put

        @NotNull
 @Contract(mutates="param")
public static @NotNull java.lang.Object put(@NotNull
                                                                                   @NotNull java.lang.Object object,
                                                                                   @NotNull
                                                                                   @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys,
                                                                                   @NotNull
                                                                                   @NotNull java.lang.Object value)
        Assuming the given object is a JSONArray or a JSONObject, put the given value at given nesting keys.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to put to.
        keys - the nesting keys.
        value - the value to be put.
        Returns:
        the given object if the value can be put, or a replacement object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given object or keys or value is null.
        Since:
        0.2.0 ~2021.06.01

 @Contract(mutates="param")

        Delegates to put(Object, List, Object) with the keys being the result of invoking keys(String) with the given keys.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to put to.
        keys - the source of the nesting keys.
        value - the value to be put.
        Returns:

        Throws:
